'''Trick Shots, Tricky Lights''' is a subevent during [[Roses and Muskets]].

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Roses and Muskets Trick Shots Tricky Lights 1.png
|text1  = In "Trick Shots, Tricky Lights," {{color|help|defeat opponents that endlessly appear within the time limit to score points}}. Once the challenge is over, medals will be distributed based on your score. Adjust your lineup according to the Special Lighting before starting the challenge.
|image2 = Tutorial Roses and Muskets Trick Shots Tricky Lights 2.png
|text2  = Defeating enemies during the challenge will accumulate progress toward Special Lighting. Once ready, use it at the right time to receive a temporary yet powerful combat buff. Use these effects well to complete the challenge efficiently.
}}

==Stages==
===A Stormy Encounter on a Stormier Night===
{{Description|"A sudden squall is the ideal indicator of imminent conflict, and is the perfect prelude for this picture."<br>The props crew has already set up the scene and the props, and is quietly waiting for the first shot to be filmed...}}
Unlocks 2023-12-21 10{{Colon}}00

;Monster List
{{Card List|1=Blazing Axe Mitachurl{danger=1},Crackling Axe Mitachurl{danger=1},Electro Abyss Mage{danger=1},Grounded Hydroshroom{danger=1},Grounded Geoshroom{danger=1},Hilichurl Fighter,Hilichurl Berserker,Whirling Electro Fungus,Whirling Cryo Fungus,Whirling Pyro Fungus|type=Enemy|show_caption=1}}

;"Special Lighting"
Biting Glacial Ray &mdash; For 12s after using, unleash a Hydro shockwave centered around your active character every 4s. Opponents hit will be dealt Hydro DMG. All Cryo DMG dealt by party members will be increased by 60%.

;Trial Characters
{{Card|Kamisato Ayaka|Lv. 80}}{{Card|Barbara|Lv. 80}}

===A Furious Clash of Rage===
{{Description|"Not enough! Not enough conflict! What I want is rage, such rage as though it is on the verge of exploding!"<br>At Melies' instructions, the cameraman has switched to monochrome. Perhaps only such a stylized scene can meet the stringent requirements of this director "overflowing with talent"...}}
Unlocks 2023-12-23 04{{Colon}}00

;Monster List
{{Card List|1=Ruin Guard{danger=1},Ruin Drake: Earthguard{danger=1},Anemo Hilichurl Rogue,Assault Specialist Mek - Ousia,Suppression Specialist Mek - Ousia,Geovishap|type=Enemy|show_caption=1}}

;"Special Lighting"
Sharp Silhouette Ray &mdash; For 12s after using, unleash a shockwave at the location of opponents hit by your active character's Normal Attacks, dealing True DMG to nearby opponents. 1 such shockwave can be released every 1s.

;Trial Characters
{{Card|Yoimiya|Lv. 80}}{{Card|Yun Jin|Lv. 80}}

===Attack of the Out-of-Position False Images===
{{Description|"Excellent! Let's go deeper!"<br>A plethora of disorderly lighting effects are quietly pushing the story towards its climax, but it isn't easy to execute a combat performance in such conditions...}}
Unlocks 2023-12-25 04{{Colon}}00

;Monster List
{{Card List|1=Ruin Grader{danger=1},Ruin Drake: Earthguard{danger=1},Geovishap{danger=1},Primordial Bathysmal Vishap{danger=1},Ruin Defender,Ruin Scout|type=Enemy|show_caption=1}}

;"Special Lighting"
Distorted Dazzling Ray &mdash; For 12s after using, the Elemental Burst DMG of all characters in the party is increased by 80%. When characters have less than 70% Elemental Energy, their Energy Recharge is increased by 50%.

;Trial Characters
{{Card|Raiden Shogun|Lv. 80}}{{Card|Xiangling|Lv. 80}}

===Termination in Twilight Most Terrible===
{{Description|"This is the final action scene. Everyone, give it your best!"<br>The stage for the final battle is set, and the Kameras are ready to roll. The most unique scene in this experimental film is about to be wrapped up!}}
Unlocks 2023-12-27 04{{Colon}}00

;Monster List
{{Card List|1=Tainted Water-Spouting Phantasm{danger=1},Large Hydro Slime,Large Pyro Slime,Hydro Mimic Boar,Large Electro Slime,Mutant Electro Slime|type=Enemy|show_caption=1}}

;"Special Lighting"
Focused Arc Ray &mdash; For 12s after using, when a character obtains an Elemental Shard created by the Crystallize reaction, all Geo DMG dealt by characters in the party will be increased by 30%. This effect lasts for 6s and may stack up to 6 times.

;Trial Characters
{{Card|Navia|Lv. 80}}{{Card|Gorou|Lv. 80}}
